price: Ya ce: "Aminci ya tabbata a gare ka! zan nẽmi Ubangijina Ya gãfarta maka.* Lalle Shi Ya kasance Mai girmamãwa gare ni."
arabic: قَالَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكَۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِي حَفِيّٗا
footnotes: * Ibrãhĩm yã mayar da magana mai kyau da laushi da aminci ga maganar ubansa mai mũni da gautsi da tsõratarwa. Wannan yanã kõyar da yadda ake kira zuwa ga Allah da kuma yadda ya kamãta a tausasa wa uba kõ dã shi kãfiri ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla salāmun ʿalayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbī innahu kāna bī ḥafiyyan
